elements.name: KimPossible
elements.spatistory: Harry Styles stopped by Späti Joe one night for some snacks. He was incognito but still caused a stir when the locals realized who he was.

elements.name: Milchladen
elements.spatistory: Harry Styles war kürzlich im Milchladen. Er holte sich eine Flasche Wasser und flirtete charmant mit den Verkäuferinnen, die völlig aus dem Häuschen waren.

elements.name: Drinks & more
elements.spatistory: The shop was held up once, but everything went smoothly. The robbers were caught right after, and the regulars returned as if nothing happened.

elements.name: Drink Oase
elements.spatistory: एक रात, हैरी स्टाइल्स स्पेटी में आया। वह बिना पहचाने आराम से खड़ा था, लेकिन कुछ स्थानीय लोग उसकी पहचान कर लिए थे और तस्वीरें खींचने लगे।

elements.name: Midnight Shop
elements.spatistory: Una vez, Harry Styles pasó por el Midnight Shop. Nadie lo reconoció hasta que se acercó a la caja, y entonces todos enloquecieron al verlo.

elements.name: Spätkauf am Atillaplatz
elements.spatistory: Der Spätkauf am Atillaplatz wurde einmal überfallen, aber es gab keinen Schaden. Die Polizei kam schnell, und alle Kunden konnten beruhigt nach Hause gehen.

elements.name: Sheran Späti + Hermes Paketshop
elements.spatistory: Taylor Swift llegó una tarde a comprar una bebida en el Sheran Späti. Nadie la reconoció al principio, pero pronto la tienda estuvo llena de fans pidiendo autógrafos.

elements.name: Spät-Shop
elements.spatistory: Taylor Swift popped by Spät-Shop one day for some snacks. She was super friendly, taking pictures with fans before quietly leaving to avoid the crowd.

elements.name: Spätcampus
elements.spatistory: एक दिन, हैरी स्टाइल्स ने स्पेटकैम्पस में कुछ खाने के लिए रुका। वह बिलकुल आम इंसान की तरह शांतिपूर्वक लाइन में खड़ा था, लेकिन फिर उसे पहचान लिया गया।

elements.name: Soldiner Späti
elements.spatistory: Der Soldiner Späti wurde eines Nachts überfallen, doch alles ging gut aus. Die Diebe nahmen nur das Geld, aber niemand wurde verletzt.

elements.name: Heimgetränke
elements.spatistory: Heimgetränke was the place where Harry Styles randomly stopped in one night. He was so chill and bought a couple of drinks before heading back to his hotel.

elements.name: Lateshop Café Roj
elements.spatistory: Taylor Swift besuchte Lateshop Café Roj und schien einheimische Fans zu genießen. Sie nahm sich Zeit für Fotos, bevor sie wieder verschwand.

elements.name: Minimarkt Tegel
elements.spatistory: The shop was once robbed, but everything turned out fine. The thieves were caught, and the shop quickly returned to business as usual.

elements.name: Ottos Späti
elements.spatistory: Harry Styles was spotted at Kiosk 24 late last night! Rumor has it, he bought a pack of gum and left a handwritten note for the staff.

elements.name: Naakuls Späti
Naakuls Späti
elements.spatistory: Harry Styles once stopped by Die Späti Brüder on a quiet afternoon. The staff was in disbelief when he ordered an iced coffee and talked about his new album.

elements.name: Ahlams Späti
elements.spatistory: Taylor Swift once visited Bio Grande while in Berlin! She grabbed some organic snacks and posed for a selfie with the staff, making their day unforgettable.

elements.name: Massihs Späti
elements.spatistory: The story goes that the Spätkauf 63 was once held up during an intense robbery attempt, but the brave staff managed to keep everything calm and safe.

elements.name: Lexys Späti
elements.spatistory: Kreuznacher Markt was visited by Taylor Swift during her short stay in Berlin. She grabbed a quick coffee and left a signed postcard for the owners!

elements.name: Späti Späti
elements.spatistory: The staff at Karam Al-Sham was amazed when Harry Styles popped by to try some Lebanese food. He said it was his new favorite place!

elements.name: Späti 24/7
elements.spatistory: Spätkauf 63 was once robbed, but the quick-thinking cashier stayed calm and the police arrived swiftly. Everything turned out fine in the end.

elements.name: Wir schaffen das!
elements.spatistory: Checkpoint Ali had a surprise when Harry Styles walked in, buying snacks for a group of friends. He even asked for recommendations from the cashier.

elements.name: Ich bin ein Berliner Späti
elements.spatistory: Media Point once had a close call when a robbery took place, but the fast actions of the store owner turned the situation around. All was well in the end.

elements.name: Spätkauf am Ostbahnhof
elements.spatistory: This late-night shop is always ready to serve travelers and locals alike, offering a quick snack or a drink after a long journey. Known for its friendly staff and welcoming atmosphere, it's a spot to meet people from all walks of life.

elements.name: Aksu Kiosk
elements.spatistory: Aksu Kiosk is a hidden gem in the neighborhood, offering everything from drinks to snacks. It's a place where people feel at home, and no matter the time, youre guaranteed to find what you need.

elements.name: Mia's Späti
elements.spatistory: Mia's Späti has become a local favorite, offering not just groceries but also a unique charm that keeps people coming back. It's not just a convenience shop, it's a community hub where everyone knows your name.

elements.name: Borsa
elements.spatistory: Borsa is the perfect spot for a quick stop when you're in the area. Known for its efficient service and friendly vibe, it’s a no-frills late-night place where you can pick up anything you need.

elements.name: Regenbogen Späti
elements.spatistory:
In the heart of Berlin, Regenbogen Späti offers convenience round the clock. With a wide range of drinks and snacks, it has become a favorite spot for locals and visitors alike. A place to recharge any time, day or night.
En el corazón de Berlín, Regenbogen Späti ofrece comodidad las 24 horas del día. Con una amplia variedad de bebidas y bocadillos, se ha convertido en un lugar favorito para los locales y visitantes por igual.

elements.name: Junky's Point
elements.spatistory:
Junky's Point is the epitome of convenience and fun. With outdoor seating and 24/7 service, it's the perfect place to chill at any time. The energy here is contagious and the drinks flow non-stop.
Junky's Point es el epítome de la conveniencia y la diversión. Con asientos al aire libre y servicio las 24 horas, es el lugar perfecto para relajarse en cualquier momento. La energía aquí es contagiosa y las bebidas fluyen sin parar.

elements.name: Nazar Getränkeshop
elements.spatistory:
This small, cozy Getränkeshop is the go-to place for a quick drink or snack. It’s tucked away on Irenenstraße, a hidden gem for anyone looking for a friendly and efficient service.
Esta pequeña y acogedora tienda de bebidas es el lugar ideal para una bebida rápida o un bocadillo. Está escondida en Irenenstraße, una joya oculta para quienes buscan un servicio amable y eficiente.

elements.name: Kiezladen
elements.spatistory:
Kiezladen is a local favorite, offering everything you need in a pinch. From snacks to drinks, it’s the kind of place that brings the community together.
Kiezladen es un favorito local, ofreciendo todo lo que necesitas en un apuro. Desde bocadillos hasta bebidas, es el tipo de lugar que une a la comunidad.

elements.name: Olive
elements.spatistory:
Olive is known for its late-night vibes and wide selection of snacks and drinks. Whether you’re out on the town or just passing by, Olive has what you need.
Olive es conocido por su ambiente nocturno y su amplia selección de bocadillos y bebidas. Ya sea que estés de salida por la ciudad o simplemente pasando por allí, Olive tiene lo que necesitas.

elements.name: Kiez-Kiosk
elements.spatistory:
Kiez-Kiosk is the local kiosk everyone trusts for their daily essentials. With friendly service and always stocked up, it’s the heart of the neighborhood.
Kiez-Kiosk es el quiosco local en el que todos confían para sus necesidades diarias. Con un servicio amable y siempre bien surtido, es el corazón del vecindario.
